content:
As a resident individual in India, the income tax rate for the financial year 2021-2022 is as follows:

* Up to INR 2.5 lakhs: Nil
* INR 2.5 lakhs to INR 5 lakhs: 5%
* INR 5 lakhs to INR 7.5 lakhs: 10%
* INR 7.5 lakhs to INR 10 lakhs: 15%
* INR 10 lakhs to INR 12.5 lakhs: 20%
* INR 12.5 lakhs to INR 15 lakhs: 25%
* Above INR 15 lakhs: 30%

Therefore, if your share of the profits is up to INR 5 lakhs, you would not be required to pay any income tax. If your share of the profits is above INR 5 lakhs, you would be required to pay income tax at the applicable tax rate.

I hope this information is helpful. Let me know if you have any other questions.
